subject: Re: [junit] How to write a junitcode for the following code
msgSnippet: ... But sometimes it can be fun, too. And c mon, how many times do you /want/ to give a sarcastic answer and manage to restrain yourself.  I m amazed at how
messageBody:
At 5/12/2005 11:37 AM, Simon Chappell <simonpeterchappell@...> wrote:
>On 5/12/05, Bradley, Todd <todd.bradley@...> wrote:
> > Would it be unethical to give a completely misleading answer, to punish
> the student who was too lazy to read the JUnit documentation and figure
> out his homework for himself?
>
>Yes.

But sometimes it can be fun, too.

And c'mon, how many times do you /want/ to give a sarcastic answer and
manage to restrain yourself. I'm amazed at how calmly J.B. seems to
respond to the same old questions.

-Rob


Rob Biedenharn <Rob_Biedenharn@...>

(H) 513-677-2172 http://alum.mit.edu/www/rob_biedenharn/
